prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
Vijay Kumar S
Email: Vijay.salagulla@gmail.com
Mobile No: 9731061068                            
Professional Summary
Accomplished and results-driven IT professional with 5.11 years of experience in Software Testing.
Expertise in Manual and Automation Testing, working in small to medium-sized teams.
Hands-on experience in multiple roles, including Process Analyst, Senior Analyst, and Specialist.
Specialized in Banking, Finance, and Insurance domains.
Experienced in Agile (SCRUM) methodology and active participation in Agile ceremonies.
Proficient in testing Web Applications and performing various testing types: System, Integration, Regression, Smoke, Sanity, and User Acceptance Testing (UAT).
Skilled in Test Planning, Test Case Design, Execution, Status Reporting, and Test Completion Reporting.
Knowledge of SQL queries for data validation.
Experience in Data Migration/Transfer Testing.
Strong expertise in Selenium WebDriver with Java, integrating Cucumber BDD and TestNG frameworks.
Hands-on experience in Defect Management and participation in Defect Triage calls.
Experienced in API Testing using Postman and Swagger Hub.
Experienced in CI/CD tools like Git, GitHub, Maven and Jenkins.
Experienced in Test Estimation, Requirement Analysis, Planning and reporting for both functional & automation testing, and Performing Test optimization analysis for functional and automation tests.
Strong analytical skills, leadership qualities, and excellent communication & interpersonal skills.
Technical Skills
Types of Testing – Smoke, System Integration, System, End-to-End, Regression, UAT, API, and Web (UI) Testing.
Methodologies - Agile - Scrum
Test Management Tools :- JIRA
Automation Tools & Frameworks: – Selenium WebDriver, Postman, Cucumber BDD, TestNG, Core Java, Page Object Model (POM), Jenkins, Git, GitHub, Maven, Eclipse IDE, Apache POI.
Education
Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication Engineering from Anna University
Employment History
Currently working as
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
